abstract: Profile of Buffalo Bills quarterback Ryan Fitzpatrick, who played college football at Harvard, where he completed 59.9 percent of his passes and lead team to a 10-0 season as a senior; Fitzpatrick was thinking of a career on Wall Street before learning that maybe the NFL was the way to go.
snippet: The Bills’ Ryan Fitzpatrick was thinking of a career on Wall Street before learning that maybe the N.F.L. was the way to go.
lead_paragraph: The Bills’ Ryan Fitzpatrick was thinking of a career on Wall Street before learning that maybe the N.F.L. was the way to go.

headline.main: Businesslike Quarterback Has Stirred the Bills
headline.print_headline: Businesslike Quarterback Has Stirred the Bills
headline.seo: Businesslike Fitzpatrick Guides Bills’ Stirring Start
